plot: Dennis and Dee's Nazi grandfather is wasting away in a hospital, and it's their choice whether to pull the plug or not. Meanwhile, Charlie and Mac go crazy trying to find a dog painting they think has a lot of value.

After the gang gets a visit by the attorney, Frank, Dee, and Dennis all have to decide on what to do with their grandpa. On either pulling his life support plug or leaving it in. While at the same time feuds arise between the gang involving pop-pop, Dee and Dennis's mom, and Franks dementia.—James Hake
